products.name: FCS C-3 CLASSIC
products.description: 3 piece classic traction, designed to suit all boards.

products.name: RYAN CALLINAN PRO SERIES
products.description: Our Ryan Callinan pro series surfboard tail pad is designed by the Mayor of Mereweather himself. A high performance pad, constructed from lightweight, high impact, water-resistant EVA.

products.name: KANOA IGARASHI PRO SERIES
products.description: This surfboard tail pad is designed by no other than WSL tour surfer Kanoa Igarashi. A high performance pad, constructed from lightweight, high impact, water-resistant EVA with slotted grooves and Kanoa's custom square diamond groove pattern.

products.name: FCS FILIPE TOLEDO TRACTION
products.description: Designed and tested in collaboration with the world's best surfers, the FCS Athlete Series Traction range has rider-specific features for the ultimate in performance.

products.name: KANOA IGARASHI LITE TRAC
products.description: This surfboard tail pad is designed by no other than WSL tour surfer Kanoa Igarashi. A high performance pad, constructed from lightweight, high impact, water-resistant EVA with slotted grooves and Kanoa's custom square diamond groove pattern.

products.name: TYLER WRIGHT PRO SERIES
products.description: The Tyler Wright pro series surfboard tail pad has been custom designed by the 2 x World Champ herself. Designed for power surfing and constructed with lightweight, high impact, waterproof EVA.

products.name: FCS KOLOHE ANDINO TRACTION
products.description: The Kolohe Andino signature traction is now available in six different colors, as well as two different colors for the grom-sized grips.

products.name: FCS SALLY FITZGIBBONS TRACTION
products.description: Sally Fitzgibbons' signature 3 piece pad. Designed to feel secure when powering through turns and releasing the tail.

products.name: MICRO GROM
products.description: Get your Grom shredding with the Micro Grom 3-Piece surfboard tail pad. Designed for high performance surfing, this pad is super grippy adding precision and drive to your grom's surfing.

products.name: FREDERICO MORAIS PRO SERIES
products.description: Hailing from the wave-rich country of Portugal, Fred`s surfing has been shaped from big beach breaks and slabbing points. A known power surfer who can combine big turns with airs, there is little wonder why Fred has become Europe`s No.1 surfer.

products.name: FCS JULIAN WILSON TRACTION
products.description: Julian Wilson's signature 3 piece pad. Designed for increased traction and reduced weight.

products.name: FCS T-2 TRACTION
products.description: 2 piece traction, designed to suit hybrid boards.

products.name: FCS II MICK FANNING TRI FINS
products.description: Mick Fanning's signature FCS II MF fin in premium PC material for controlled powerful surfing.

products.name: FCS II KOLOHE ANDINO TRI FINS
products.description: Kolohe Andino's 'KA' signature fin. Delivers a lively mix of drive, pivot and release.

products.name: FCS II JULIAN WILSON LARGE TRI FINS
products.description: Julian Wilson's 'JW' signature fin. Speed and projection for progressive surfing.

products.name: FCS II FILIPE TOLEDO TRI FINS

products.name: FCS II JULIAN WILSON PC AIRCORE TRI FINS

products.name: FCS II SALLY FITZGIBBONS TRI FINS
products.description: Sally Fitzgibbons' SF signature fin. Ideal for beach breaks.

products.name: FCS II JEREMY FLORES TRI FINS
products.description: With a focus on power and a more connected approach, Jeremy's new large signature template lends DNA from multiple fins.

products.name: FCS II FILIPE TOLEDO TRI FINS
products.description: Filipe Toledo's 'FT' signature fin. Ultra-light material for fast progressive surfing.

products.name: FCS II NATHAN FLORENCE BIG WAVE TRI FINS
products.description: Nathan Florence's signature FCS II Big Wave fin in premium performance glass material, tested and proven in Hawa√Ø, these precision-cut fins are built for big wave surfing.
